abstract: Beijing’s detention of four Rio Tinto employees has rocked the global iron ore industry, strained China-Australia relations and could have a chilling effect on foreign businesses doing deals in China.
snippet: Beijing’s detention of four Rio Tinto employees has rocked the global iron ore industry, strained China-Australia relations and could have a chilling effect on foreign businesses doing deals in China.
lead_paragraph: On July 5, officials from China’s Ministry of State Security took four employees of the Anglo-Australian mining giant Rio Tinto into custody here.

headline.main: China Rattles Investors With Detention of Executives
